newsitem.title: USA: American Int'l Petroleum closes Kazakh deal.
newsitem.headline: American Int'l Petroleum closes Kazakh deal.

text.p: American International Petroleum Corp said Thursday it has closed on the purchase of its 70 percent interest in MED Shipping Usturt Petroleum Co by paying $300,000 in cash, 1.45 million shares and 500,000 warrants to purchase the company's stock at $2 a share.
Of these shares and warrants, MED received 725,000 shares and 250,000 warrants, and Enterdynamics received 725,000 shares and 250,000 warrants, American International said.
An additional 1.5 million shares will be issued to MED and Enterdynamic should the stock trade above $5 a share for five consecutive trading days, the company said.
The company noted it announced on July 10 that the government of Kazakhstan transferred the title of the exploration License No. 953 to MED Shipping Usturt Petroleum, a private Kazakh company.
